thread.title: Nitro Athletics: Theo Campbell blows Morgan Mitchell a kiss - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Nitro Athletics: Theo Campbell blows Morgan Mitchell a kiss - Yahoo7

author: On February
title: Nitro Athletics: Theo Campbell blows Morgan Mitchell a kiss - Yahoo7
text:
Share Nitro Athletics: Theo Campbell blows Morgan Mitchell a kiss - Yahoo7 Theo Campbell decided to blow Morgan Mitchell a kiss as he ran her down in the Nitro Athletics mixed relay. Close Cheeky Brit blows Morgan Mitchell a kiss UP NEXT VIDEO Cheeky Brit blows Morgan Mitchell a kiss. Source: Channel 7 Cheeky Brit blows Morgan Mitchell a kiss 
And the Aussie's response was gold. 
Mitchell was desperately trying to hold onto the lead in the opening event of Nitro II on Thursday night, but was no match for Campbell as he pipped her at the post. 
The cocky Brit turned and looked at Mitchell as he crossed the finish-line, blowing a cheeky kiss in her direction. Image: Getty 
Asked about the incident after the race, Mitchell said she didn't even see it. 
"Not really," she said when asked if she noticed it. "It's kinda cute, he thinks he's a big, strong man." Close Mitchell gets revenge in 2x300m UP NEXT VIDEO Mitchell gets revenge in 2x300m. Source: Channel 7 Mitchell gets revenge in 2x300m 
"They're not even close to us on the leaderboard so oh well." 
The Aussies ended second on the overall leaderboard behind the Bolt All-Stars for the second-straight night, but it could have been very different if not for a disqualification in the final event. Close
